name: Tommasini SpA
goal: Tommasini Spa is an international privately own company whose aim is to promote and develop new businesses models in the retail fashion industry. Tommasini Spa is in the process of launching innovative garment production in terms of materials its sustainability and recycling process with open vision on the circular economy.
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Research and innovation, Sport, Trade
